review_title: You get what you pay for.
reviews:
I am 6' tall.....180 lbs.....athletic build.

These shirts are a touch short for my body. When I lift my arms, my stomach /back is visible. Wish they were 2 inches longer.

The charcoal gray is kind of ugly, and is brown when wet lol....not what I was expecting. Fruit of the loom has this colour perfected.

The shirts are also crispy in the charcoal grey. Other colors may be softer....who knows. Fruit of the loom are soft unlike these.

Overall I will accept them for what they are.....cheap work shirts......as they are still worth the few bucks a shirt.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews:
I am 6.1 in height and 180Lb
I usually buy large and I decided to go with extra large which was a mistake as the shoulders of the t shirts where hanging and was feeling too big. I had to send it back
I bought LG size and it fitted perfect .
I am really happy with the shirts.
But I did notice that the colour of the light coloured t shirts tend to loose a bit of colour.
Over all it‚Äôs a good deal. üëçüèª
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: I love these t-shirts and so does the hubs. They are well made (good stitching, especially around the neck), are a lovely medium weight cotton and the colors are great. Didn't get a duplicate color in the bunch which I did not expect. My only negative would be that they run on the large size.....but hey, they're t-shirts; tuck 'em in! These are perfect for people that wear one every day under other clothing. They will be great in the winter due to the weight of the cotton weave.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: Like any clothing, you can't always trust the size or labels that state "preshrunk". I read a lot of the reviews about this product and the general theme was that the shirts are well made and well worth the price but seemed to shrink some when washed. I bought large instead of medium and washed them first (always a good idea). The result was 12 well fitting shirts. My advice (for what it's worth) is buy a size larger than you need and wash them first... you likely won't be disappointed. For $5 a shirt... not bad at all.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: They immediately shrunk from a very roomy XL to a barely loose L, which is fine as I bought up a size in case of shrinking, but the length is now closer to a M which just sucks. Why aren't these pre shrunk!? Otherwise quality seems ok. Fairly light weight material, which is probably why they shrunk. These aren't plain flat colours either, they are blended/mottled. Received two light grey shirts.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: I read a lot of comments prior to buying and completely recommend what they all say. Buy a slight bigger size (I'm 5'7" 140lbs so bought Med). It was little bigger but did as recommended, wash them prior to wearing them and now they fit amazing. Just the arms ( bicep area is still a bit loose) BUT hey for $5.25 a shirt, it is worth every penny!
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: I took the advice of many here and purchased one size larger than I needed, then immediately dumped the whole lot into the washing machine, and then the dryer. The shirts are now the perfect size and free of potential skin irritants such as excess dye and chemicals like Urea formadehyde used to prevent mildew during shipping.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: Nice to have so many different colours to pick from. I find it really doesn't matter how much you spend on a "T" shirt, after a few washes, it's time to throw them out These were inexpensive so I won't feel so bad.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews:
Ordered a pack of 12. I got 13 instead. Right out of package, shirts were a good fit. However, looked boxy and sleeves were protruding. Looked funny. Would have put 3 stars for the price and quality.
But, after one warm wash, 5 out of 5. Snug fit. Shirt hugs your body and the sleeve problem is gone. Would recommend washing it out of package.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: After washing, they do shrink a bit. Fit is still good. Not happy with the loose stitching on a couple of shirts. Will start coming apart after a dozen loads or so.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

review_title: Great value well made t shirts
reviews: The colours were great and they seem to be well made. These fit perfect and as expected until the first time I washed them, they went from a nice fit 2xl to a belly shirt. I‚Äôm still wearing them I just have to stretch them out before wearing them after each wash.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

review_title: good quality and do not shrink
reviews: I'm a tall guy and most t-shirt sleeves are too short for me. These sleeves are perfect and the fit is comfortable. I just wish I could pick the colours I wanted instead of getting a bunch of random colours. But for the price point, it's unbeatable.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

review_title: Not as 'heavy' as their older shirts.
reviews: I would give this pack a 5 rating if the shirts were indeed the heavy-cotton thickness of even a couple of years ago, but these are just a bit thinner. Colours are good though, and hey, they're just t-shirts.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

review_title: Shrunk a bit in the dryer, otherwise ok
reviews: Purposefully ordered a size larger than what i needed so that after it shrunk they'd still fit. Almost worked perfectly but the hem is still a bit too short after shrinking (i'm 6' 3'')
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: I wouldn't call it a heavy cotton, but it's certainly not a light/thin cotton. I'd call it about a medium weight. It has a nice fit. The length is good (below belt, even with arms up, but above groin). The construction seems like it should last.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: These shirts fit as described. Make sure you check the sizing chart because their medium is slightly smaller in the chest and shoulders than a typical Canada or USA retail outlet's medium. I washed them in lukewarm water and they did not shrink and the colors did not run as far as I could tell. The fabric is a medium weight 100% cotton or cotton/polyester blend. They all felt soft and were not scratchy, even the 50/50 blend. They are quite comfortable. Also the price is amazing.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: Washed in warm water and yes they do shrink that's why I bought one size up. Colours are nice and bright. Shoulder width is perfect but I find them a touch too wide around the waist. Length is perfect too.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: All the shirts are nice colours and fabric is good quality and will last a while provided you treat it really right. Good deal for the amount of shirts you get. I would recommend these to anyone
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: I usually take a large, but wanted extra room so ordered X-Large. I hang dry all clothing that has shrink potential. After doing this, the XL still turned out to be more of a Large fit and too small after several washings and air drying. I've had to re-order, but in XXL and hope that this will do the job. Otherwise, good product and colour choice.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: I'm a big cheapo and I was just looking to buy a bulk pack of good quality shirts that don't fit weird or shrink awkwardly. These shirts are perfect, super durable and comfortable to wear. 6'1 about 215lbs size Large fits me comfortably.

review_title: I don't know if I'd call it "heavy" cotton....
reviews: ...but maybe that's an industry standard. In any case, this is a great deal. Shirts fit, the colour is accurate (sand=light tan), they have tear-off collar tags, and they're the usual quality you expect of Gildan. I've bought a couple dozen of their "safety green" (yeah, yellow) tees over the years and I've always been very happy. The price just can't be beat.
product_name: GILDAN Men's Classic Heavy Cotton T-Shirt (Pack of 12)

reviews: Good cotton quality. Thicker than other products. The shirts shrank a bit after washing them especially in terms of length. But still suitable. It would be better if they make 2XT... Quick delivery service. Beware that Canada Post will charge you 20.85 for taxes. They should have asked for around 10 $. Will ask for a refund.
